availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Winston T. Simmons (Grant County, KY, attorney)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, teacher and attorney. Bullitt County, Kentucky, native. Son of James Simmons and Mary Winston Simmons. Married to Eugenia C. Price Simmons in Scott County on May 10, 1854. Father of William M. Simmons, Cora W. Simmons, Lizzie Simmons, James E. Simmons, and Winston T. Simmons. Attorney in Grant County from c1841 to 1885. Schoolteacher in Kenton County, Kentucky in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in 1850. Attorney in Williamstown, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
